<div style ="BORDER-BOTTOM:1pt solid #000000;BORDER-LEFT:1pt solid 
#000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1pt solid #000000;BORDER-TOP:1pt solid #000000;MARGIN-
LEFT:0px;MARGIN-RIGHT:0px;WIDTH:100%"><div style="width:97%; margin-top:1.5%; 
margin-left:1.5%; margin-right:-1.25%">
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="5" COLOR="#595959"><B>PENGROWTH ENERGY CORPORATION </B></FONT></P> <P 
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="5" COLOR="#595959"><B>NOTES TO THE FINANCIAL 
STATEMENTS </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:14px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="1">AS AT AND FOR THE PERIOD ENDED JUNE 30, 2013 
(Unaudited)
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:arial" SIZE="1">(Tabular amounts are stated in thousands of dollars 
except per share amounts and as otherwise stated) </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="3"><B>1.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="3"><B>BUSINESS OF THE CORPORATION </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P 
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">Pengrowth Energy Corporation
(&#147;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2">Pengrowth</FONT><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&#148; or the &#147;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-
family:ARIAL" SIZE="2">Corporation</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">&#148;) is
a Canadian resource company that is engaged in the production, development, 
exploration and acquisition of oil and natural gas assets. The Financial 
Statements include the accounts of the Corporation, and all of its subsidiaries 
existing in prior
periods, collectively referred to as Pengrowth. All inter-entity transactions 
have been eliminated. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-
bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">The Financial Statements 
for the three and six
months ended June&nbsp;30, 2013 are unaudited and have been prepared in 
accordance with IAS 34 Interim Financial Reporting (&#147;</FONT><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2">IAS 34</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">&#148;) using
accounting policies consistent with the International Financial Reporting 
Standards (&#147;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" 
SIZE="2">IFRS</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&#148;) issued by 
the International Accounting Standards
Board (&#147;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2">IASB</FONT><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&#148;) and International Financial Reporting
Interpretations Committee
(&#147;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2">IFRIC</FONT><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&#148;). The disclosures provided below are 
incremental to those included with the December&nbsp;31, 2012 annual 
Consolidated Financial
Statements. The Financial Statements should be read in conjunction with the 
audited Consolidated Financial Statements and the notes thereto in 
Pengrowth&#146;s annual report for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2012. 
</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">The Financial Statements were authorized for release by the Audit and 
Risk Committee of the Board of Directors on August&nbsp;1, 2013. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="3"><B>2.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="3"><B>CHANGES IN ACCOUNTING POLICIES </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P 
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">As disclosed in the
December&nbsp;31, 2012 annual Consolidated Financial Statements, on 
January&nbsp;1, 2013, Pengrowth adopted new standards with respect to IFRS 10 
Consolidated Financial Statements, IFRS 11 Joint Arrangements, IFRS 12 
Disclosures of Interests in
Other Entities, as well as the consequential amendments to IAS 28 Investments in
Associates and Joint Ventures (2011), IFRS 13 Fair Value Measurement and IFRS 7 
Amendments to Financial Instrument Disclosures. The adoption of these standards 
had no
impact on the amounts recorded in the Financial Statements as at January&nbsp;1,
2013 but did result in additional disclosures with regards to IFRS 13 and IFRS 
7. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2" COLOR="#333333">COMPARATIVE FIGURES 
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:arial" SIZE="2">As of January&nbsp;1, 2013, certain technical support 
costs, previously included
in operating expenses, are included in General and Administrative 
(&#147;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2">G&amp;A</FONT><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&#148;) expenses. Comparative figures for 
G&amp;A and operating expenses
have been adjusted accordingly with no impact on net income (loss). Management 
believes that these presentation changes better reflect Pengrowth&#146;s 
operating results. As required under IFRS, changes in the accounting for the NAL
Acquisition that
arose in the fourth quarter of 2012 were adjusted retrospective to the second 
quarter of 2012. Net income and basic and diluted earnings per share comparative
figures for the three and six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2012 have been adjusted
accordingly. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-
bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="3"><B>3.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="3"><B>OTHER 
ASSETS </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-
bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2" COLOR="#333333">OTHER 
INVESTMENT </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">Pengrowth owns 1.0&nbsp;million shares of a private corporation with an
estimated fair value of $5 million.&nbsp;This investment is classified as fair 
value through
profit or loss. The fair value is based in part on recent private placement 
equity offerings by the private company. Pengrowth owns a minority interest and 
does not have significant influence over the private corporation.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">As the company is private, the estimated fair value is not based on 
observable market data and there are restrictions on selling the shares. 
Therefore, it is
uncertain if Pengrowth could realize this value in an open market and, as such, 
the fair value is subject to revision. The fair value has decreased to $5 
million as at June&nbsp;30, 2013 (December 31, 2012 &#150; $20 million), 
resulting in an
unrealized loss of $15.0 million for the six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2013 
(June 30, 2012 &#150; $nil). </FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P></div></div>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:arial" SIZE="2">During the six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2013, 
approximately $8.3 million (June 30, 2012 &#150; $5.9 million) of directly
attributable general and administrative costs were capitalized to property, 
plant and equipment (&#147;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" 
SIZE="2">PP&amp;E</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&#148;). 
</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">The calculation of depletion for the six months ended June&nbsp;30, 
2013 excluded certain capital from the construction phase of the Lindbergh
thermal project
(&#147;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2">Lindbergh 
Project</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&#148;) of $155.8 million
(June 30, 2012 &#150; $nil). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-
bottom:0px"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">Pengrowth capitalizes interest for qualifying
assets in the construction phase based on costs incurred on the project and the 
average cost of borrowing. Interest capitalization to a qualifying asset ceases 
once
construction is substantially complete. During </FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P></div></div>
<p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<IMG SRC="g569421g51h05.jpg" ALT="LOGO">
&nbsp;34</B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" 
SIZE="1">PENGROWTH&nbsp;Second&nbsp;Quarter&nbsp;2013&nbsp;Financial&nbsp;Result
s</FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<div style ="BORDER-BOTTOM:1pt solid #000000;BORDER-LEFT:1pt solid 
#000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1pt solid #000000;BORDER-TOP:1pt solid #000000;MARGIN-
LEFT:0px;MARGIN-RIGHT:0px;WIDTH:100%"><div style="width:97%; margin-top:1.5%; 
margin-left:1.5%; margin-right:-1.25%">
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">
the six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2013, $1.1 million (June 30, 2012 &#150; 
$nil) of interest was capitalized on the Lindbergh Project to PP&amp;E using a 
capitalization rate of 5.7 percent (June
30, 2012 &#150; nil). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-
bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">In the first six months of 
2013, Pengrowth successfully closed the disposition of the
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-operated</FONT> Weyburn property and other 
minor properties for proceeds of $326.0 million, which resulted in gains on 
divestitures of $14.4 million. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-
bottom:0px"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">As part of the continued focus on 
dispositions, Pengrowth has presented $49.9 million of <FONT STYLE="white-
space:nowrap">non-core</FONT> producing properties as assets held for sale and 
classified them as current
assets on the Balance Sheet. The related dispositions closed in July 2013 for 
total proceeds, prior to closing adjustments, of $39.0 million. The assets were 
recorded at the lesser of fair value less costs to sell and their carrying 
amount. A loss
on assets held for sale of $28.1 million was recorded on reclassification. This 
was comprised of $20.0 million relating to PP&amp;E and $8.1 million relating to
goodwill. These amounts are reflected as (gain) loss on disposition of 
properties on the
Statements of Income (Loss). The related asset retirement obligations 
(&#147;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2">ARO</FONT><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&#148;) of $11.6 million were presented as 
liabilities associated with
assets held for sale and classified as current liabilities on the Balance 
Sheets. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">Including the amounts above during the six 
months ended June&nbsp;30,
2013, $13.7 million of losses were recorded on divestitures (June 30, 2012 
&#150; $1.9 million gain). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-
top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

administrative costs related to E&amp;E activities were capitalized. </FONT></P>

<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:arial" SIZE="2">Pengrowth has goodwill allocated to several cash 
generating units (&#147;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" 
SIZE="2">CGU</FONT><FONT
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&#148;). As Pengrowth disposes of certain 
properties, goodwill associated with the property disposed of is included in the
carrying amount of the property when determining the gain or loss on disposal. 
Unless
specific goodwill can be identified to the property disposed of, the amount is 
measured on the basis of the relative values of the property disposed of and the
portion of the CGUs retained. </FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P></div></div>

<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000">&nbsp;<FONT

<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT

<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2">&#150;</FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #999999"><FONT

STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">49,735</FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #999999"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"> <P STYLE="margin-
left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2"><FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Non-current</FONT> portion of long term 
debt</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:ARIAL" SIZE="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000" ALIGN="right"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2">1,387,699</FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:arial" SIZE="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000" ALIGN="right"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">1,480,898</FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#cceeff">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:ARIAL" SIZE="2">$</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000" ALIGN="right"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" 
SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1,387,699</FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:arial" SIZE="2">$</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000" ALIGN="right"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial"
SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp
;&nbsp;&nbsp;1,530,633</FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:arial" SIZE="2">Pengrowth&#146;s unsecured covenant based revolving 
credit facility includes a committed value of $1 billion and a $250 million
expansion feature, providing $1.25 billion of credit capacity from a syndicate 
of seven Canadian and three foreign banks. The facility can be extended at 
Pengrowth&#146;s discretion any time prior to maturity, subject to syndicate 
approval. In the
event that the lenders do not agree to a renewal, the outstanding balance is due
upon maturity. The facility was renewed in July of 2013 and now has a maturity 
date of July&nbsp;26, 2017 with all other material terms and conditions 
remaining
unchanged. Prior to the July 2013 renewal, the facility had a maturity date of 
November 29, 2015. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-
bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">This facility carries 
floating interest rates that
are expected to range between 2.5 percent and 4.25 percent over bankers&#146; 
acceptance rates, depending on Pengrowth&#146;s ratio of senior debt to earnings
before interest, taxes and <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-cash</FONT> 
items. At
June&nbsp;30, 2013, the available facility was undrawn (December 31, 2012 &#150;
$160 million) and letters of credit in the amount of $28.1 million (December 31,
2012 &#150; $28 million) were outstanding. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" 
SIZE="2" COLOR="#333333">BANK INDEBTEDNESS </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-
top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">Pengrowth 
also maintains a $50
million demand operating facility with one Canadian bank. At June&nbsp;30, 2013,
this facility was undrawn (December 31, 2012 &#150; $nil) and reduced by $0.8 
million of outstanding letters of credit (December 31, 2012 &#150; $0.9 
million). When
utilized together with any overdraft amounts, this facility appears on the 
Balance Sheets as a current liability in bank indebtedness. </FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P></div></div>
<p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-
COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE">
<TR>

<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="13%"></TD>

<div style ="BORDER-BOTTOM:1pt solid #000000;BORDER-LEFT:1pt solid

margin-left:1.5%; margin-right:-1.25%">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="3"><B>9.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="3"><B>DEFERRED INCOME TAXES </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P 
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">A reconciliation of the deferred
income tax reduction calculated based on the income (loss) before taxes at the 
statutory tax rate to the actual provision for deferred income taxes is as
follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-
bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-
COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="75%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="4%"></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="4%"></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" COLSPAN="6" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">Six months ended</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000">&nbsp;<FONT 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" COLSPAN="2" ALIGN="right" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid 
#000000"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL"

<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial"
SIZE="3"><B>11.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="3"><B>SHARE 
BASED COMPENSATION PLANS </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-
top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">A rolling 
maximum of 3.2
percent of the issued and outstanding common shares may be reserved for issuance
under all share based compensation plans in the aggregate, as approved by 
shareholders. As at June&nbsp;30, 2013, the number of shares issuable under the 
share based
compensation plans, in aggregate, represents 1.9 percent of the issued and 
outstanding common shares, which is within the limit. </FONT></P>

SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P></div></div>

SIZE="1">These compensation plans were used while Pengrowth was a trust. 
Effective January&nbsp;1, 2011, no further grants were made under these plans.

June&nbsp;30, 2013, all of the grants were fully vested and the majority of the 
total outstanding balance was comprised of grants to the Board of Directors.

23.0&nbsp;million shares (nil and

issuable on potential conversion of the convertible debentures that were assumed
in the May 2012 NAL acquisition were excluded from the diluted net income (loss)
per
share calculation as their effect is anti-dilutive. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-

STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">2.64 </FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:arial" SIZE="2">$</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000" ALIGN="right"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp
;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.22</FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:arial" SIZE="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000" ALIGN="right"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">Cdn</FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:arial" SIZE="2"><I>Commodity Price Sensitivity </I></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">Each Cdn$1/barrel change in future oil prices would result in 
approximately Cdn$14.5 million <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">pre-tax</FONT> 
change in the
unrealized gain (loss) on commodity risk management contracts as at 
June&nbsp;30, 2013 (June 30, 2012 &#150; Cdn$7.0 million). Similarly, each 
Cdn$0.25/MMBtu change in future natural gas prices would result in approximately
Cdn$17.0 million <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">pre-tax</FONT> change in the unrealized gain (loss) 
on commodity risk management contracts (June 30, 2012 &#150; Cdn$6.0 million). 
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">As at close June&nbsp;30, 2013, the AECO gas 
spot price was $3.01/MMBtu (June 30, 2012 &#150; $2.03/MMBtu), the WTI prompt 
monthly price was Cdn$101.56/barrel (June 30, 2012 &#150; Cdn$86.50/barrel). 
</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P></div></div>
<p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE">

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:arial" SIZE="2">As at close June&nbsp;30, 2013, the Alberta power pool 
spot price was $138.22/MWh (June 30, 2012 &#150; $20.28/MWh). The average
Alberta power pool price was $123.41/MWh for the three months ended 
June&nbsp;30, 2013 (June 30, 2012 &#150; $40.03/MWh). </FONT></P> <P 
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2"><I>Power Price Sensitivity
</I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:arial" SIZE="2">Each Cdn$1/MWh change in future power prices would result
in approximately Cdn$0.2 million <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">pre-tax</FONT>
change in
the unrealized gain (loss) on power risk management contracts as at 
June&nbsp;30, 2013 (June 30, 2012 &#150; Cdn$0.1 million). </FONT></P> <P 
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" 
SIZE="2" COLOR="#333333">FOREIGN
EXCHANGE CONTRACTS </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2"><I>U.K. pound sterling Denominated Term Debt 
</I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">Pengrowth entered into foreign exchange risk 
management contracts when it issued the U.K. pound sterling term notes. These 
contracts fix the Canadian dollar to the U.K. pound sterling exchange rate on 
the interest
and principal of the U.K. pound sterling denominated debt as follows: 
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-
bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-
COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="54%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="4%"></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD></TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#cceeff">
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid
#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:arial" SIZE="2">Amount (U.K. pound sterling 000's)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid
#000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid
#000000"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid
#000000" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">Maturity&nbsp;date</FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-
BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid
#000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid
#000000"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&nbsp;</FONT><BR>
<P STYLE="margin-bottom:1px; margin-top:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid
#000000" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">Fixed&nbsp;rate</FONT><BR> <P STYLE="margin-bottom:1px; margin-top:0px"
ALIGN="right"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">($1Cdn&nbsp;=&nbsp;U.K.&nbsp;pound&nbsp;sterling)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-
BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><BR>
<P STYLE="margin-bottom:1px; margin-top:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #999999"> <P STYLE="margin-
left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">50,000</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #999999"><FONT 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #999999"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:arial" SIZE="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #999999" ALIGN="right"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">December&nbsp;2015</FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #999999"><FONT

STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">0.50</FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #999999"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#cceeff">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"> <P STYLE="margin-
left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">15,000</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT

STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">0.63</FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:arial" SIZE="2"><I>U.S. Denominated Term Debt </I></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2">A series of swap contracts were transacted in order to fix the foreign 
exchange rate on a portion of Pengrowth&#146;s U.S. dollar denominated term 
debt. Each swap
requires Pengrowth to buy U.S. dollars at a predetermined rate and time based 
upon the maturity dates of the U.S. denominated term debt. </FONT></P> <P 
STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<div style ="BORDER-BOTTOM:1pt solid #000000;BORDER-LEFT:1pt solid
#000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1pt solid #000000;BORDER-TOP:1pt solid #000000;MARGIN-
LEFT:0px;MARGIN-RIGHT:0px;WIDTH:100%"><div style="width:97%; margin-top:1.5%; 
margin-left:1.5%; margin-right:-1.25%">
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2"><I>Foreign Exchange Rate Sensitivity </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-
top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2"><I>Foreign Exchange on Foreign Denominated 
Term Debt </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">The following summarizes the sensitivity on a
<FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">pre-tax</FONT> basis, of a change in the foreign 
exchange rate related to the translation of the foreign denominated term debt 
and the offsetting change in the fair value of the foreign exchange risk 
management contracts
relating to that debt, holding all other variables constant: </FONT></P> <P 
STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:ARIAL" SIZE="2" COLOR="#333333">INTEREST RATE CONTRACTS </FONT></P> <P 
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">The following interest rate swap contracts 
were outstanding at June&nbsp;30, 2013. These contracts reduce exposure to 
rising interest rates by fixing the interest rate on floating rate debt. Under 
the contracts,
Pengrowth pays the fixed interest rate, and receives the floating interest rate 
on the notional amounts. The floating interest rate received is the three-month 
Bankers Acceptance CDOR (&#147;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" 
SIZE="2">Canadian
Depository Offered Rate</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">&#148;). 
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-
bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:arial" SIZE="2"><I>Interest Rate Sensitivity </I></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="2"><I>Interest Rate Contracts </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-
top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">A 1 percent 
change in interest
rates, with all other variables held constant, would result in approximately 
$0.2 million <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">pre-tax</FONT> change in interest 
expense as at June&nbsp;30, 2013 (June 30, 2012 &#150; $0.7 million), due to the
change in
fair value of the derivatives contracts. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-
top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2"><I>Bank 
Interest Cost </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">As at June&nbsp;30, 2013, Pengrowth had no 
debt outstanding based on floating interest rates therefore Pengrowth had no 
interest rate risk. For the six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2012, a 1 percent 
increase in
interest rates would have increased <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">pre-
tax</FONT> interest expense by $2.4 million. </FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P></div></div>

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; 
bottom:.8ex">(1)</SUP>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

SIZE="1">Unrealized gains and losses are presented as a separate caption in 
revenue. Realized gains and losses are included in oil and gas sales.
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:3px;margin-top:0px;margin-
bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; 
bottom:.8ex">(2)</SUP>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="1">Unrealized gains and losses are included in other (income) expenses and
interest expense. Realized gains and losses are included in operating expenses 
and
interest expense. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:3px;margin-
top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; 
bottom:.8ex">(3)</SUP>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="1">Unrealized and realized gains and losses are included as part of 
separate captions in expenses. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" 
SIZE="2" COLOR="#333333">FAIR VALUE </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-
bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">The fair value of cash and 
cash
equivalents, accounts receivable, accounts payable, and dividends payable 
approximate their carrying amount due to the short-term nature of those 
instruments. The fair value of the Canadian dollar revolving credit facility is 
equal to its carrying
amount as the facility bears interest at floating rates and credit spreads 
within the facility are indicative of market rates. The fair value of the 
remediation trust funds and minority investment in a private company are equal 
to their carrying
amount as these assets are carried at their estimated fair value. </FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P></div></div>
<p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-
COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="13%"></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" NOWRAP><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="1"><B>
<IMG SRC="g569421g51h05.jpg" ALT="LOGO">
&nbsp;44</B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

SIZE="1">PENGROWTH&nbsp;Second&nbsp;Quarter&nbsp;2013&nbsp;Financial&nbsp;Result
s</FONT></TD>
<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="3"><B>16.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="3"><B>COMMITMENTS </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-
top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">Additional 
contractual commitments relating to
the Lindbergh Project were entered into resulting in a balance of $58.9 million 
at June&nbsp;30, 2013. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-
top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="3"><B>17.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" 
SIZE="3"><B>SUBSEQUENT EVENTS </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-
top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">On 
July&nbsp;16, 2013, Pengrowth announced
the sale of approximately $700 million, subject to closing adjustments, 
regulatory and, in one case, shareholder approval, of <FONT STYLE="white-
space:nowrap">non-core</FONT> assets which is in addition to the $326 million of
disposition proceeds
received in the first six months of 2013. These sales are expected to close in 
the third quarter of 2013. The carrying value of the properties, net of ARO, at 
June&nbsp;30, 2013 was approximately $820 million and, subject to successful 
closing,
Pengrowth will record an after tax loss of approximately $75&nbsp;million to 
$95&nbsp;million, subject to finalization of normal course closing adjustments. 
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:arial" SIZE="2">Pengrowth renewed its revolving credit 
facility in July of 2013. The facility now matures on July 26, 2017 with all 
other material terms and conditions remaining unchanged. </FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT 
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P></div></div>

<TITLE>Exhibit 99.2</TITLE>

 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 99.2 </B></FONT></P> <P 
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>FORM 52-109F2 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>CERTIFICATION OF INTERIM FILINGS 
</I></B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>FULL CERTIFICATE </I></B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">I, Derek W. Evans, President and Chief Executive Officer of 
Pengrowth Energy Corporation, certify the following: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New
Roman" SIZE="2">1.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2"><B><I>Review: </I></B>I have reviewed the interim financial report and 
interim MD&amp;A (together, the &#147;interim filings&#148;) of Pengrowth Energy
Corporation (the
&#147;issuer&#148;) for the interim period ended June&nbsp;30, 2013. 
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-
bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">2.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2"><B><I>No misrepresentations: </I></B>Based on my knowledge, having 
exercised reasonable diligence, the interim filings do not contain any untrue 
statement of a material
fact or omit to state a material fact required to be stated or that is necessary
to make a statement not misleading in light of the circumstances under which it 
was made, with respect to the period covered by the interim filings.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-
bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">3.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2"><B><I>Fair presentation: </I></B>Based on my knowledge, having 
exercised reasonable diligence, the interim financial report together with the 
other financial
information included in the interim filings fairly present in all material 
respects the financial condition, financial performance and cash flows of the 
issuer, as of the date of and for the periods presented in the interim filings.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-
bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">4.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2"><B><I>Responsibility: </I></B>The issuer&#146;s other certifying 
officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure 
controls and procedures
(DC&amp;P) and internal control over financial reporting (ICFR), as those terms 
are defined in National Instrument 52-109 <I>Certification of Disclosure in 
Issuers&#146; Annual and Interim Filings</I>, for the issuer. 
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">5.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2"><B><I>Design: </I></B>Subject to the limitations, if any, described in 
paragraphs 5.2 and 5.3, the issuer&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and I 
have, as at the end
of the period covered by the interim filings </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P 
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2">designed DC&amp;P, or caused it to be designed under our supervision, 
to provide reasonable assurance that </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">(i)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2">material information relating to the issuer is made known to us by 
others, particularly during the period in which the interim filings are being 
prepared; and
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-
bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">(ii)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2">information required to be disclosed by the issuer in its annual 
filings, interim filings or other reports filed or submitted by it under 
securities legislation is
recorded, processed, summarized and reported within the time periods specified 
in securities legislation; and </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-
size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2">designed ICFR, or caused it to be designed under our supervision, to 
provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting 
and the preparation
of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with the 
issuer&#146;s GAAP. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-
top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">5.1</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2"><B><I>Control framework: </I></B>The control framework the 
issuer&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and I used to design the issuer&#146;s
ICFR is the criteria set
forth by the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadway Commission 
(COSO) in Internal Control-Integrated Framework. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P 
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">5.2</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2"><B><I>N/A</I></B> </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-
size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">5.3</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2"><B><I>N/A</I></B> </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2 </FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">6.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2"><B><I>Reporting changes in ICFR</I></B><B>:</B> The issuer has 
disclosed in its interim MD&amp;A any change in the issuer&#146;s ICFR that 
occurred during the period
beginning on April 1, 2013 and ended on June 30, 2013 that has materially 
affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the issuer&#146;s ICFR. 
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Date: August&nbsp;1, 2013 
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-
bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="40%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-
COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="100%"></TD></TR>

<TD VALIGN="bottom" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px;border-
bottom:1px solid #000000"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">/s/
Derek W. Evans</FONT></P></TD></TR>

<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Derek W.

and Chief Executive Officer</FONT></TD></TR>

<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 99.3
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Exhibit 99.3</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 99.3 </B></FONT></P> <P 
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>FORM 52-109F2 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>CERTIFICATION OF INTERIM FILINGS 
</I></B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-
family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>FULL CERTIFICATE </I></B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">I, Christopher G. Webster, Chief Financial Officer of Pengrowth 
Energy Corporation, certify the following: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">1.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2"><B><I>Review: </I></B>I have reviewed the interim financial report and 
interim MD&amp;A (together, the &#147;interim filings&#148;) of Pengrowth Energy
Corporation (the
&#147;issuer&#148;) for the interim period ended June&nbsp;30, 2013. 
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-
bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">2.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2"><B><I>No misrepresentations: </I></B>Based on my knowledge, having 
exercised reasonable diligence, the interim filings do not contain any untrue 
statement of a material
fact or omit to state a material fact required to be stated or that is necessary
to make a statement not misleading in light of the circumstances under which it 
was made, with respect to the period covered by the interim filings.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-
bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">3.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2"><B><I>Fair presentation: </I></B>Based on my knowledge, having 
exercised reasonable diligence, the interim financial report together with the 
other financial
information included in the interim filings fairly present in all material 
respects the financial condition, financial performance and cash flows of the 
issuer, as of the date of and for the periods presented in the interim filings.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-
bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">4.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2"><B><I>Responsibility: </I></B>The issuer&#146;s other certifying 
officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure 
controls and procedures
(DC&amp;P) and internal control over financial reporting (ICFR), as those terms
are defined in National Instrument 52-109 <I>Certification of Disclosure in 
Issuers&#146; Annual and Interim Filings</I>, for the issuer. 
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">5.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2"><B><I>Design: </I></B>Subject to the limitations, if any, described in 
paragraphs 5.2 and 5.3, the issuer&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and I 
have, as at the end
of the period covered by the interim filings </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P 
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2">designed DC&amp;P, or caused it to be designed under our supervision, 
to provide reasonable assurance that </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">(i)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2">material information relating to the issuer is made known to us by 
others, particularly during the period in which the interim filings are being 
prepared; and
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-
bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">(ii)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2">information required to be disclosed by the issuer in its annual 
filings, interim filings or other reports filed or submitted by it under 
securities legislation is
recorded, processed, summarized and reported within the time periods specified 
in securities legislation; and </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-
size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2">designed ICFR, or caused it to be designed under our supervision, to 
provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting 
and the preparation
of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with the 
issuer&#146;s GAAP. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-
top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0"
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">5.1</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2"><B><I>Control framework: </I></B>The control framework the 
issuer&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and I used to design the issuer&#146;s
ICFR is the criteria set
forth by the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadway Commission 
(COSO) in Internal Control-Integrated Framework. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P 
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">5.2</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2"><B><I>N/A</I></B> </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-
size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" 
CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New 
Roman" SIZE="2">5.3</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" 
SIZE="2"><B><I>N/A</I></B> </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
